storyInfo: Op Team A4 escorts patients to a temporary location while Rhodes Island is being rebuilt, resulting in conflict with the local population that Adnachiel must resolve.

attributes.content: We don't want any trouble, sir.
attributes.name: Level-Headed Patient

attributes.content: We're just here at this office for a bit while reconstruction work is going on at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Level-Headed Patient

attributes.content: The office has an agreement with the city council. We'll live on an undeveloped plate, and we won't have any contact with the people in the county.
attributes.name: Level-Headed Patient

attributes.content: We won't trouble you at all.
attributes.name: Level-Headed Patient

attributes.content: Won't trouble us? Then what about this bloke? He showed up at MY door!
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: I'm from Ashford! I left after selling my home to pay medical bills.
attributes.name: Agitated Patient

attributes.content: I just wanted to see what became of my old house!
attributes.name: Agitated Patient

attributes.content: So it was you!
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: I spent big money on this house, only to learn that the previous owner was some bloody Infected!
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: Nothing has gone right since then, and I can't find a buyer for the place! This is all your fault!
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: You said you're from Ashford? I've got news for you, friend: there was no place for you here the moment you got Oripathy!
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: Why youâ€”
attributes.name: Agitated Patient

attributes.content: How dare you fight back! I swear you'll pay for this!
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: What's all the commotion?
attributes.name: County Police

attributes.content: Sir, weâ€”
attributes.name: Level-Headed Patient

attributes.content: You're those new Infected, aren't you? Why are you here in town and not on the plate that's been assigned to you?
attributes.name: County Police

attributes.content: These dirty Infected attacked me, sir!
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: I... I just...
attributes.name: Agitated Patient

attributes.content: Knew nothing good could come of letting Infected in. You're under arrest!
attributes.name: County Police

attributes.content: That's right! Run them out of town! Who knows if they're really just here for a while, or if they aren't planning something dirty.
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: Sir, weâ€”
attributes.name: Level-Headed Patient

attributes.content: Hold it.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Mr. Adnachielâ€”
attributes.name: Agitated Patient

attributes.content: I came as soon as I heard. Are you okay?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: We're fine. Butâ€”
attributes.name: Level-Headed Patient

attributes.content: And who might you be?
attributes.name: County Police

attributes.content: Adnachiel, Rhodes Island Reserve Op Team A4. I was in charge of escorting these patients.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I take responsibility for their actions.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: And how exactly do you propose to take this responsibility? Who'd make it up to us if you exploded and killed us?
attributes.name: County Police

attributes.content: Rhodes Island is doing everything in our power to prevent that from happening.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Hmph. 'Everything in your power'. Like that counts for anything. Don't think you can throw your weight around just because some bigwig let you in.
attributes.name: County Police

attributes.content: I can run all of you out of town for this, you hear me?
attributes.name: County Police

attributes.content: ...*sigh*.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Now, you're coming with me, and don't you dare make a wrong move!
attributes.name: County Police

attributes.content: The director of the Rhodes Island branch office shouldn't be here right now, Adamant.
attributes.name: County Police

attributes.content: And I shouldn't open this door for you.
attributes.name: County Police

attributes.content: But I'll let you see him because Rhodes Island treated my brother.
attributes.name: County Police

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Adamant

attributes.content: Are Rodrey and Palmera doing alright? I don't suppose the people here will be too hard on them if they've got the 'main culprit' locked up like this.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: They're doing fine.
attributes.name: Adamant

attributes.content: Wish I could say the same about the situation, though.
attributes.name: Adamant

attributes.content: We've got a few witnesses who can testify that it was that young man who incited the conflict, but that's not going to matter to the people who're simply looking for an excuse.
attributes.name: Adamant

attributes.content: A lot of people were already unhappy about the government's decision to allow Oripathy patients to stay on the undeveloped plate.
attributes.name: Adamant

attributes.content: And now, they've found their excuse. I got word that some of the nobles are already on their way to the city council as we speak, to discuss whether to accept these patients.
attributes.name: Adamant

attributes.content: ...*sigh*.
attributes.name: Adamant

attributes.content: The placement plans while construction at Rhodes Island is going on were intended to allow patients to be closer to home.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Rodrey was born and raised here. He went through so much before he found his place at Rhodes Island. Who could blame him for wanting to see his old home again?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: No one's blaming him, not in this room anyway.
attributes.name: Adamant

attributes.content: But it took tremendous effort and all the connections the branch could muster in order to persuade the powers to allow the patients to settle on the undeveloped plate.
attributes.name: Adamant

attributes.content: We'll have a problem on our hands if these patients have to leave.
attributes.name: Adamant

attributes.content: I know. Amongst the three counties in this region where we have an office, Ashford is already the friendliest towards the Infected.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: We wouldn't have to gather all the patients here if the other two counties didn't turn us down.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Exactly. If they're deported, they'll have to take the long way round to branches in other regions, which is too much of a burden for the patients...
attributes.name: Adamant

attributes.content: It's time for you to go, Adamant.
attributes.name: County Police

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Adamant

attributes.content: I'm in charge here, and this is my responsibility.
attributes.name: Adamant

attributes.content: I'll find a way to get you out, and deal with the aftermath. There are a few influential nobles in the city council whom we might be able to sway.
attributes.name: Adamant

attributes.content: Say, Adamant, remember that side hustle you wrote to me about last year?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: How is it going?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Not too bad, I suppose.
attributes.name: Adamant

attributes.content: But is this really the time to talk about that?
attributes.name: Adamant

attributes.content: ...I have an idea. I'll need you to find my teammates.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: You know those Infected on the undeveloped plate?
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: Go gather up the boys, and we'll teach them a lesson.
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Curious Youth

attributes.content: Word has gotten out about what happened in the morning. Everybody in the county has their eyes on them now.
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: All we need to do is add fuel to the fire.
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: Do we really need to go that far?
attributes.name: Curious Youth

attributes.content: They're Infected, for Terra's sake! Do YOU want a bunch of ticking time bombs sleeping next door?
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: Well... guess not...
attributes.name: Curious Youth

attributes.content: Don't you understand? Once we've done this, we'll be the heroes of the county, no matter how things turn out in the end.
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: Heroes who drove the Infected out!
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: Think of the money we can make! No one will look down on us anymore! You want to live a better life, don't you?
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: ...Yeah.
attributes.name: Curious Youth

attributes.content: Then go get the boys!
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: And grab some weapons!
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: Today's the day that we become heroes of Ashford!
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: I'm with you!
attributes.name: Curious Youth

attributes.content: Finally, here's my big chance...
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: It's your unlucky day, Infected. You're gonna make me a lot of money.
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: Listen, I don't have the money right now, but I'll have it soonâ€”
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: Am I speaking to Mr. Philips?
attributes.name: Dignified Woman

attributes.content: Uh, guess you are... what do you want from me?
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: I'm a spice merchant based in Londinium, and my business has taken me to Ashford lately.
attributes.name: Dignified Woman

attributes.content: I would like to purchase my own residence here, and I learned that your house is for sale. If you're still selling, I'm willing to offer a very competitive price.
attributes.name: Dignified Woman

attributes.content: ...Râ€”Really?
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Dignified Woman

attributes.content: But I'mâ€”
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: I'm afraid I have little time to waste, and I shall have to look elsewhere should you be unable to give me an answer on the spot.
attributes.name: Dignified Woman

attributes.content: Uh... Iâ€”I see, alright, just tell me the place and I'll come find you.
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: Please come to the cafe at Council Square.
attributes.name: Dignified Woman

attributes.content: Aâ€”Alright, I'll be right there.
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: Today is my lucky day!
attributes.name: Hot-Blooded Youth

attributes.content: I got the boys, Philipsâ€”hey, where did he go?
attributes.name: Curious Youth

attributes.content: That young man...
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: He was hot-headed, actively inciting conflict with the patients. From his outfit, I gather he was not of means.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: He could be the spark that sets off the fire.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: At the same time, he's also the easiest potential threat to neutralize.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: My speculation is that he's not actually actively hostile to Oripathy patients, but rather trying to stir up conflict and profit from it.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Melantha comes from a family of merchants. She will have no trouble playing the part of a wealthy businesswoman who's interested in buying the house.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Distract him from the Infected, and he won't be stirring up anything for a while.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: That's one potential threat neutralized.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: But this is just the start.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: What comes next is the tough part.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I say run them all out of town, along with this Rhodes Island of theirs!
attributes.name: Agitated Citizen

attributes.content: I was against the Rhodes Island office from the beginning! We should do as all the other counties do, and kick out anyone who has Oripathy!
attributes.name: Agitated Citizen

attributes.content: What if you're the one who gets Oripathy?
attributes.name: Hesitant Citizen

attributes.content: Me, Oripathy? Never! I eat well, sleep well, and exercise every day!
attributes.name: Agitated Citizen

attributes.content: If you ask me, what happened today was just a matter of time.
attributes.name: Agitated Citizen

attributes.content: I tell you, my uncle's on his way to the city council right now to convince the other nobles to run these Infected out of town.
attributes.name: Agitated Citizen

attributes.content: ...I know a few Rhodes Island doctors. They're good people.
attributes.name: Hesitant Citizen

attributes.content: So what? Can they cure Oripathy?
attributes.name: Agitated Citizen

attributes.content: ...I suppose you're right.
attributes.name: Hesitant Citizen

attributes.content: See? We don't need the Infected here, and we don't need doctors treating those Infected.
attributes.name: Agitated Citizen

attributes.content: Not necessarily.
attributes.name: Mild-Mannered Youth

attributes.content: What, are you speaking up for the Infected?
attributes.name: Agitated Citizen

attributes.content: No, I'm not speaking up for them.
attributes.name: Mild-Mannered Youth

attributes.content: I just want to offer another perspective.
attributes.name: Mild-Mannered Youth

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Hesitant Citizen

attributes.content: Under the faint lamplight, the young man clutches his collar, hiding the Originium crystals on his body.
The city council has been talking about developing those unused plates for years, but work has yet to begin for various reasons.
attributes.name: Mild-Mannered Youth

attributes.content: At the end of the day, it all comes down to two things: Money and manpower.
attributes.name: Mild-Mannered Youth

attributes.content: As far as money goes, I'm sure the nobles have plenty.
attributes.name: Mild-Mannered Youth

attributes.content: The problem has always been manpower.
attributes.name: Mild-Mannered Youth

attributes.content: That's true... my uncle's an engineer, and he said no contractor wants to take that job because it's all pain and no gain. It's been a headache for the city council for a while.
attributes.name: Hesitant Citizen

attributes.content: If we kick out the Infected because we don't need them. In the same way, do we throw out an unused plate because we don't need it?
attributes.name: Mild-Mannered Youth

attributes.content: To hell you will! It was paid by MY taxes!
attributes.name: Agitated Citizen

attributes.content: You got a better idea?
attributes.name: Hesitant Citizen

attributes.content: Why don't we shut the Infected and the pharmaceutical company who treats them on the undeveloped plate, and let them develop it for us?
attributes.name: Mild-Mannered Youth

attributes.content: It's futile trying to persuade the public that our patients are harmless and under Rhodes Island control.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: The public naturally tends to reject Oripathy once it enters the consciousness.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: The simplest and most effective solution is to distract them with something even bigger.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Steward is one of the most persuasive people I've met. He should be able to influence public opinion to a certain extent.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: At the very least, we can give the public a third optionâ€”
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: 'If we're going to deal with the Infected anyway, we might as well make them work for us.'
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: It's not a nice thing to think about.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: But it's the best I can come up with under present circumstances.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: While we might be able to influence public opinion to an extent, it ultimately just serves to prevent public opinion from forcing the nobles' hand.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: The last and most important part is the nobles' decision.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I'm counting on you, Cardigan.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: A few days later...
We've been discussing this for days, Lord Viscount. It's time we came to a decision.
attributes.name: Laid-Back Baron

attributes.content: Something as trivial as whether to kick a bunch of Infected out has already caused me to miss three performances that I was looking forward to.
attributes.name: Laid-Back Baron

attributes.content: YOU were the one who proposed to have a Rhodes Island office in the county, and YOU were the one who persuaded the Lord Viscount to let those patients in.
attributes.name: Scathing Baron

attributes.content: Are you trying to pretend all that didn't happen?
attributes.name: Scathing Baron

attributes.content: I always have the best interests of the county at heart.
attributes.name: Laid-Back Baron

attributes.content: Rhodes Island is a pharmaceutical company with a bright future. Working with them can only be a positive for the county. Indeed, medical care in the county has improved considerably in the past two years.
attributes.name: Laid-Back Baron

attributes.content: As for the patients, it's not like the undeveloped plate was doing anything useful just being left to collect dust. Much better to do Rhodes Island a favor and collect on it later.
attributes.name: Laid-Back Baron

attributes.content: Besides, remind me who's been talking about developing the new plate and doing exactly nothing about it?
attributes.name: Laid-Back Baron

attributes.content: I would hardly have proposed to use it to house the patients if it was doing anything useful.
attributes.name: Laid-Back Baron

attributes.content: Hâ€”How DARE you! I bet you're behind those people stirring up the masses and talking about using the patients to develop the new plate!
attributes.name: Scathing Baron

attributes.content: Would you believe me if I said I wasn't?
attributes.name: Laid-Back Baron

attributes.content: Hmph. Whatever you're planning, I can tell youâ€”
attributes.name: Scathing Baron

attributes.content: Those patients couldn't possibly have the capability to develop the new plate.
attributes.name: Scathing Baron

attributes.content: You and I can say whatever we want. At the end of the day, it's the Lord Viscount's word that counts.
attributes.name: Laid-Back Baron

attributes.content: Rufus. I listened to you about Rhodes Island, and they have indeed generated considerable economic value for the county.
attributes.name: Reserved Viscount

attributes.content: I hear that some of the people are now in favor of allowing them to stay on the new plate... if they help us develop the new plate.
attributes.name: Reserved Viscount

attributes.content: But this notion is not realistic. What can a rabble of patients possibly achieve?
attributes.name: Reserved Viscount

attributes.content: Speaking... yes, very well.
attributes.name: Laid-Back Baron

attributes.content: Tell them to come in.
attributes.name: Laid-Back Baron

attributes.content: You're absolutely correct, Your Ladyship.
attributes.name: Laid-Back Baron

attributes.content: But what if it's not just the patients helping to develop the plate?
attributes.name: Laid-Back Baron

attributes.content: Greetings, Lord Viscount.
attributes.name: Adamant

attributes.content: Adamant? It's a little late to come to see me now.
attributes.name: Reserved Viscount

attributes.content: Perhaps the people with me can change your mind.
attributes.name: Adamant

attributes.content: Phew, made it in time.
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Can you believe how little time Adnachiel gave me to get help from the two nearest branches?
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: I'm completely spent.
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: You're the fastest amongst us, after all.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: I take it the other branches approved of Adnachiel's plan, from the assistance they provided.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: What can I say? They all trust our great prophet.
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: If you ask me, they just haven't found out about the evil underneath that harmless exterior.
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: What has he done, other than tricking you into paying his bill from time to time?
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: And you think that's not evil enough? Anyway, I'm making him pay for MY meals for a whole week this time!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: And you bet I'll pick the most expensive stuff!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Well, looks like his wallet's going to take a hit.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: That's right! I'll teach him that ordering me about comes at a price!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Ahemâ€”
attributes.name: Adamant

attributes.content: Oh, sorry.
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Your Ladyship, my name is Cardigan, from Rhodes Island Reserve Op Team A4.
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: I'm joined by the directors of the Rhodes Island offices in counties Dovel and Hafilax.
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: The adjacent countiesâ€”
attributes.name: Reserved Viscount

attributes.content: Rhodes Island has long been aware of County Ashford's plans to build a hospital on the new plate, but the local branch didn't have the resources to support a project of that scale.
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: We've taken this opportunity to discuss with the directors of the other offices in the area.
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: They have agreed to supply resources and manpower to assist with the building of a new hospital in Ashford.
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Now, we have both manpower and resources, if you are interested.
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Only Cardigan is fast enough to request support from the offices located in the two adjacent counties.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: The viscount will not like it. She can undoubtedly tell that someone is pulling the strings behind the scenes.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: But she will accept it, because she and Ashford have nothing to lose and everything to gain.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I learned this from the Doctor. Weave all the information together, into a web that the other side will jump in with both feet, even though they know full well it's exactly what we wanted them to do.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: This will do for the simulation, I think.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: It's as far as I can go, under present circumstances.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: As for the rest...
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Adnachiel!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Oh, thank goodness. I was just about to die of fright.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Oh, spare me, Adnachiel. You look nothing like a prisoner in despair.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Remember that you're paying for a whole week's meals, Adnachiel!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: You're asking for so much?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Of course! Melantha signed off on it.
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: You're not getting out of it this time, Adnachiel.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Hehe.
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Oh, what happened to the pure and innocent Cardigan that I know?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: The one whom you duped into paying your lunch all the time?
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: She's not so easy to fool now, thanks to a certain prophet.
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Looks like everything's taken care of.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: The patients have settled down.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: The viscount has agreed to build a hospital on the undeveloped plate with Rhodes Island. We're working out the details.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Everything as you planned.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: ...Good to hear. Thanks for the hard work, guys.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Well, I got the easy part. All I needed to do was care for the patients.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: All I needed to do was sit here and wait for you guys to get things done.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: You know, Adnachiel, this humility of yours, there's a bit of the Doctor in it.
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: ...I didn't realize how big the gulf was between me and the Doctor, until I actually tried to pull the strings in the same way.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: The challenge that we face and the burden that we carry are incomparable.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: But I'm glad I took that step.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Well, now that things have settled down, shall we go get something to eat?
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Mr. Adnachiel?
attributes.name: Lateran Messenger

attributes.content: That's me.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I bring news from the Holy City.
attributes.name: Lateran Messenger

attributes.content: ...Very well.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: What's going on, Adnachiel?
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Sorry, Cardigan, but it looks like it'll be some time before I can buy you your meals.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Captain, now that things have settled down, I would like to request temporary leave.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: You've finally made up your mind.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Yes, I have.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I bring word from Cardinal Lemuen.
attributes.name: Lateran Messenger

attributes.content: The Seventh Tribunal has approved your request to return to Laterano. You are asked to first go to the outskirts of the Holy City, where someone will be there to meet you.
attributes.name: Lateran Messenger

attributes.content: I will lead the way.
attributes.name: Lateran Messenger

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Should I expect to see you with a gun the next time we meet?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: The gun is not important.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: As I've said before, the power of the prophet does not mean I was chosen, nor does it mean that there are any hopes placed upon me.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Sankta like me appear from time to time, whose minds work a little differently from the ordinary Sankta.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: We must agree to join the Curia and be bound by it in order to win the right to carry a gun.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I just renounced this right in order to leave Laterano and see what's out there.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: And it's not for this right that I'm going back.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: You remember why the reserve op teams exist, don't you?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Of course. They're only open to operators who uphold Rhodes Island's mission and commit themselves to it.
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Many people wonder why we accepted this position, but we understand that it's not fame that we're after.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: What we want to do is help the Infected and mitigate the impact of Oripathy on Terra.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: This was the choice I made when I joined Rhodes Island, a choice that I have never regretted.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I'm going back because I want to understand what's happening to Terra.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Then, I'll come back.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I don't think I've ever seen you so serious in all the time I've known you.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Yeah, not quite used to it.
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: It's kind of weird.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: I think it's cool.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: ...I'm already starting to regret saying all that.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Say, there are lots of new desserts in the Holy City, right? Don't forget to bring some back.
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I'll be going, then.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Adnachiel waves goodbye to his friends and sets off for Laterano with the Messenger.
He does not turn back.
Nor is there the sweet sorrow of parting on the faces of Cardigan and the others.
For parting is only fleeting, and tighter are the ties that bind them together.
